name.ja: <ruby>鉄獣式強襲機動兵装改<rt>トライブリゲード・アームズ</rt></ruby>＂<ruby>Ｂｕｃｅｐｈａｌｕｓ<rt>ブーケファルス</rt></ruby><ruby>Ⅱ<rt>ツー</rt></ruby>＂

text.en:
3+ Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monsters
Cannot be Special Summoned from the Extra Deck if you have 2 or less "Tri-Brigade" Spells/Traps in your GY. When you Special Summon a monster(s), your opponent cannot activate cards or effects. When a monster declares an attack: You can banish this card, also banish all cards your opponent controls. If this card is sent to the GY: You can send 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster from your Extra Deck to the GY. You an only use this effect of "Tri-Brigade Arms "Bucephalus II"" once per turn.

materials: 3+ Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monsters
